https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aHzHqo4YYXVQoCOUDfGU5IPctqN.jpg Andrew Luster, the heir to the Max factor fortune, is convicted of rape on 86 counts. This Lifetime original movie recounts the rapes committed by the infamous Andrew Luster and the women who brought him to justice. A Date with Darkness: The Trial and Capture of Andrew Luster
